import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import useNavigate from 'react-dom'; import './HomePage.css'; // Placeholder images const heroImage = 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300?text=Food+Image'; function HomePage() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [menuItems, setMenuItems] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { // Fetch menu items from backend fetch('/api/menu/') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setMenuItems(data); setLoading(false); }) .catch(() => setLoading(false)); }, []); return (
